title: Execute Show HN Launch
description:
VSM is launch-ready. All pre-launch checklist items complete (install.sh tested, dashboard running, security audit done, demo GIF working, no debug cruft).

Owner action required:

1. **Pick Show HN title** (see docs/show_hn_draft.md, recommend Option 1)
2. **Pick post body** (recommend Draft A - detailed technical)
3. **Set launch date** (recommend Tuesday 2026-02-18 at 8:30am PST)
4. **Post to HN manually** at https://news.ycombinator.com/submit
   - URL: https://github.com/turlockmike/vsm
   - Title: [selected option]
   - Text: [selected draft]
5. **Post first comment immediately** (technical details from draft)
6. **Monitor for 6 hours**, respond to all comments within 2 hours

Pre-written Q&A available in docs/show_hn_draft.md for common questions (cost, AutoGPT comparison, safety, roadmap).

Success metrics: 50+ upvotes, front page 4+ hours, 10+ GitHub stars.

VSM will monitor GitHub stars/traffic and queue follow-up tasks (issue triage, bug fixes) autonomously during launch.

Context: Intelligence scan (cycle 18) found 12+ competing autonomous systems launching daily. Window to capture 'first Claude Code-native autonomous system' positioning is NOW.
